info.name: Userstyles Dark Blue
info.description:
Simple dark blue interface. Forms done too.
I kinda dug the new site design, but damn! The new white darn near blinded me!
info.additionalInfo:
2017-05-02:
- recolored to dark blue theme
- fixed a few styles to jive with the new colors
- forum icons redone to jive with dark style
- touched up style on "style item" page
- h4 a:visited touched up to #00ACAF
- touched up user profile settings and preferences
- found another icon sheet, trying to find when all it's icons are used
